attributes.action: Criminal Injuries Compensation Authority in the case of Margaret Skidmore.
attributes.background: Margaret Skidmore was beaten up severely after discovering the person who had raped and murdered her daughter. She has been denied compensation. Why? Why? Why?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

If you'd like a specific change to the Government’s Criminal Injuries Compensation Scheme, you could start a new petition asking for that. You can find the Scheme here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/243480/9780108512117.pdf
